description: Demolition and replacement of outbuildings with single storey side extension, basement extension, replacement of windows, other associated refurbishment works, internal and external alterations
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 3 - Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, rainwater goods on listed buildings must only be replaced with cast iron.
